items.text: yorker, dug out to mid-on.
items.postText: West Indies have got the equation down to less than a run a ball, but they've lost at least one more wicket than they would have been comfortable with
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.preText: long discussion between Mashrafe and Shakib. And Shakib will bowl now
items.text: fuller and flatter, angling into the batsman, punched to mid-on
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, spinning away a tad, pushe dto point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller and more air, he comes forward to drive to long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: drags it down short, he stays in his crease to punch it past cover
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.text: fuller once again, drawing him forward. But it's a good length and doesn't allow him to get to the pitch of the ball. Hope adjusts well though and waits and pushes the ball to point, where they take a single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller ball, driven back past the bowler for a comfortable single
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Chase, 1 run

items.preText: Sajid: "Mashrafe played 200 ODIs in his 17 years career but Shai hope already palyed 42 ODis in his two years career! Feeling bad for BD players :("
items.text: past the outside edge, and just past off stump. Offcutter from Mustafizur, that defeats the attempted steer to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: fuller ball, driven to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: back of a length, angling across, it's short enough for him to be more sure-footed in running this down to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, 1 run

items.text: too full, and driven firmly to deep cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Hope, 1 run

items.text: fuller, kept a tad low. He tried to drive it back, but it rolled away off the inside edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, no run

items.text: Chase falls into the trap and hits straight to mid-on Mashrafe had brought in long-on and long-off in Mustafizur's last over, tempting chase to go over the top. He tried dabs and steers, but finally fell prey to temptation, trying to go over the top. Ends up toe-ending to mid-off. Full ball, but not quite full for the drive, and he pays the price
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Chase, OUT

dismissal.text: RL Chase c Tamim Iqbal b Mustafizur Rahman 9 (18b 0x4 0x6) SR: 50.00

items.preText: Keemo Paul comes in. West Indies are losing their way, with nobody sticking around with Shai Hope, who has been fantastic
items.text: back of a length on the stumps, punched to mid-on
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: good length, but drifting on the pads and tucked away to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 1 run

items.text: short ball outside off, doesn't rise much. Nudged into the off side for a quick single
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Paul, 1 run

items.preText: Zahid: "@Sajid: Mashrafe had his fair share of injuries. He could have played 300+ games had he not been injured. Bangladesh has played 310 ODI's since Mashrafe's ODI debut."
items.text: back of a length on off, punched to mid-off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length outside off again, pushed to point
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller ball, comes forward to drive it, goes past cover, but Shakib runs around at the fence from deep extra cover and stops it with his boot. Almost did a football pass to the player running in from the other side
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Hope, 2 runs

items.preText: Anon06: "Time for Keemo's allrounder status to come to the fore. He batted well last game and had an off day with the ball today. Time to make up for it."
items.text: pushes this into the off side
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, swatted to deep midwicket. Hope goes to 99
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, kept really low but Paul stayed still in his crease and brought his bat down, opening the face to run it to point
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, 1 run

items.text: third ODI century for Shai Hope, standing applause from the dugout he acknowledges the cheers, but no extravagant celebration because the job remains undone. back of a length on off, and he punched it to deep cover
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hope, 1 run

items.text: pushes this into the off side and they go through for a quick single. A wild overthrow results in an extra run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, 2 runs

items.text: length ball on off, he wanted to push it into the off side and run again, but hits this too firm and too straight, back to the bowler. No run
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Paul, no run
